timeline.bodyText: There's some errant copy/paste issues with the assertion text here and with remote-home-binding below.  Also, is there any particular reason that you're not just using assertNotNull for all of these test points?
timeline.author: brideck

replies.bodyText: I copy pasted those from another test where the message was very long so it was more readable with the if statements, but since I cut the message down assertNotNull does make more sense, changed it.
replies.author: olendvcook
